page.title: 01Potters Country Market
page.content: Potters Country Market is in the centre of West Hill.At Potters there is an estate agents which is Fulfords,there is a solicitors which is Every and Philips,there is also a newsagency which is owned by Mr.and Mrs. Sweet.Up above Potters there is West Hill Casuals which sells men and womens clothes.Opposite the casuals there is a hairdressing salon. Downstairs is the main shop there are different sections.There is a bakers,post office,butchers,grocers,a place where they sell dairy products,and a little supermarket. In the newsagents which is next door they sell newspapers and comics,stationery,sweets and chocolate and ice_creams.Mr. Pow is in charge of
